interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  126  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Reset " Seen " Apples to Apples " from Yumi Yamaguchi Seen " A Castle for Everyone " from Chika Chosokabe
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 126.

progression.synopsis: Yumi is in class for once, but has taken Futaba 's desk. In the resulting discussion, Yumi is angry when Sensei says that she lacks self-control, given his own lapse .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
